head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KRUMPE, KATHRYNE (NEE VON STADE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KRUMPE, KATHRYNE (NEE VON STADE)

block.p: KRUMPE--Kathryne (Nee von Stade) of Okatie, Beaufort County, SC and New York City, NY, died June 5, 2007. Beloved wife of John, sister of Nannie Ward of Aiken, SC, Frederick von Stade of Northport Point, MI, and John von Stade of Bernardsville, NJ. Also survived by loving nieces and nephews. No funeral services are planned. In lieu of flowers, donations to favorite animal charity would be appreciated. Anderson Funeral Home is serving the family.
